content.text: KartDok is a disciplinary repository for cartography. KartDok is an open-access-service provided by the Specialised Information Service Cartography and Geodata established at Berlin State Library and funded by the German Research Foundation. It holds quality-assured research papers, pre-prints and previously published articles.

metadataPolicy.text: All bibliographic metadata provided via this interface, except abstracts, is hereby made available under CC0 license, free to share and re-use.

dataPolicy.text: The publications and electronic documents provided here must be used according to copyright laws, all rights reserved if not otherwise explicitly specified.

submissionPolicy.text: This repository is intended to hold open-access-publications in the field of cartography and geovisualization as well as the history of cartography written by academic scholars currently affiliated with a university, college or research institute.
